title: Module 1: Python for AI Engineering
text:
By the end of this module, you will be able to:

Write clean, production-grade Python
Understand Python data structures deeply
Build intuition for how Python powers AI systems

title: Python Basics for AI Engineers
text:
Python is not fast â€” ecosystems are fast.
AI engineers choose Python because: - libraries encode decades of research - prototyping speed matters more than micro-optimizations - production bottlenecks are elsewhere
